name: BeanWars 2
description:
BeanWars 2 is an FPS-Shooter Game produced by "Mr.Lonely"( me ) and i have started working on it for like 3 weeks now.

its not done yet but you can help make it better.

All the players are Beans ( Its called BeanWars. what did you expect? )

We have a lot of guns in this Game ranging from Ak-47's to ShotGun-Pistol's

Theres also alot of maps. ( not yet )

There is ScoreStreaks in BeanWars 2 and what they do is that when you get ( set amount of kills ) you can get a ( insert better gun / healing ).( not yet )

I know that it does not look good but thats beacuse We arent a big team

( "Mr.Lonely" and 3D artist )

we have a discord = https://discord.gg/eGTEPjvVMT
